title: Number of Sears stores in the United States 2011 - 2017 , by type
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Full-line stores, and Specialty stores. The y axis indicates the Number of stores and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Specialty stores is rapidly decreasing, Full-line stores is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Full-line stores, and lastly, 2. Specialty stores.
Overall across the Year, Full-line stores mostly maintained the highest Number of stores when compared to others with a mean value of 724.86, and it peaked at 2011.
Specialty stores mostly had the least Number of stores with a mean value of 220.71, which peaked at 2011 with a value of 1338.0.
Specialty stores reported the highest Number of stores about 1338.0 in Year 2011
The minimum Number of stores about 23.0, occured at 2017 by Specialty stores.
Specialty stores has decreased by 98.28101644245142 percent.
The difference of Number of stores between Full-line stores and Specialty stores is greater at Year 2017 compared to the Year 2011.
